function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased exposure to pathogens in densely populated environments","Impact":"Reduced well-being, health issues, and economic impact due to absenteeism and reduced productivity","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation and air filtration, regular disinfection of surfaces, and promotion of personal hygiene","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C disinfection systems, and IoT-based monitoring systems","People":"Population in densely populated environments","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Rapid dissemination of new diseases and elevated risk of pandemics","Impact":"Potential for widespread infection, high mortality rates, and economic disruption","Mitigation":"Early detection systems, travel restrictions, and rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Genomic surveillance, contact tracing apps, and AI-driven epidemiological models","People":"Global population","Owner":"Public health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Rapid mutation of microorganisms and adaptation as a cause of human diseases","Impact":"Potential for vaccine evasion, drug resistance, and increased transmission rates","Mitigation":"Development of broad-spectrum antiviral drugs, global surveillance networks, and vaccine research","Technologies":"CRISPR technology, big data analytics, and international collaboration platforms","People":"Global population","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
